articles.description: You can now add the Bing chat widget to your iPhone home screen and access the Chatbot right from your home screen. Find out more!
articles.content:
A detailed guide on Microsoft Bing Widgets for iPhone: what are they and how to use them
Microsoft has incorporated its new ChatGPT-powered Bing into numerous products and services to make it availa… [+2293 chars]
